com.snamp.hosting.management

Interface AgentManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregator, java.lang.AutoCloseable, PlatformPlugin, PlatformService, net.xeoh.plugins.base.Plugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentManagerBase, ConsoleAgentManager

    public interface AgentManager
extends PlatformPlugin, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Represents an interface for SNAMP manager plug-in.

    Manager is SNAMP platform component that exposes management infrastructure to administrators or tools, such as Web console, or command-line string.

    Author:
    Roman Sakno

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MANAGER_NAME
      Represents name of the system property that holds the name of the Agent manager.

    • Method Summary

      Starts the manager synchronously.

      Stops the agent.

        boolean stop()
        Stops the agent.
        Returns:
        true if manager is stopped successfully; otherwise, false.
